divs: Sighting DetailsIn a rear lot of a business (located westside of Michigan City)I was walking southbound. I first noticed the blue luminating triangular object which appeared to moderately hover to the southeast. As the object travelled southwest the shape then seemeed to appear blimplike. The object's color maintained a glowing blue the entire event.
trends: There have been 15 other sightings in Michigan City
There was one other sighting in Michigan City on or around October 18th 2011
Summary: Bright Luminating Blue, blimp-shaped object moderately hovering then continued flowing path Southwest directional in Michigan City, IN
